name: Cake Machine (Blumi_Dev, Hyd3r1, askcookie, yellow)
description:
Cake Machine

Entering the typical office cubicle, all we can see is our PC, machine looking like a lie detector, notes board with a hacker case. The Anti- Cyber Attack company called KryptonHacks gives you a task to uncover a hacking group attack. Turns out it’s actually KryptonHacks that is lying and hacks the economic system to increase the price of birthday cakes in bakeries.

  • Special Easter egg Alt+F4 to close the game :)
  • Press Space To Hack
